Terrorists attempted to storm the facility, with one detonating an explosives-laden vehicle. This incident follows intense clashes between Pakistan and Afghanistan. A fragile ceasefire is now in place, brokered by the Afghan Taliban regime.

The world in a bowl: Around the world in rice (Asia)
description: Rice is inarguably the most staple dish in any household around the world. And it’s no surprise that each and every country and continent have their own spin on the fluffy and grainy delicacy. They say a picture is worth a thousand words, but even a thousand words is not enough to cover the world as a rice bowl. Let’s explore these delicacies — one continent at a time.

description: “Nearly 400 persons of 85 families lived in the village. They have been shifted to a rest house at Manmath Swami temple in the area,” said the District Collector

title: Explained: Where is the Asia Cup trophy? When and how will India get it?
description: Despite winning the Asia Cup 2025, India has not received their trophy due to a controversy involving ACC president Mohsin Naqvi. The silverware remains locked in the ACC office after India declined to accept it from Naqvi, who insists on presenting it personally. A resolution is expected at an upcoming ACC meeting.

title: Gujarat cabinet reshuffle: Surat MLA Harsh Sanghavi takes oath as deputy CM; see full list
description: Gujarat BJP conducted a major cabinet reshuffle, with 16 ministers resigning and a new 26-member cabinet sworn in, including Deputy Chief Minister Harsh Sanghavi. This significant change comes ahead of crucial local body elections and nearly three years into Chief Minister Bhupendra Patel's current term.

‘Forging court orders, judges’ signatures’: SC flags rise in digital arrest scams
description: The Supreme Court has taken serious note of rising digital arrests across India, seeking a response from the government and CBI. This action follows a case where a senior citizen couple was digitally arrested using forged court orders, leading to extortion. The apex court emphasized that such fabrications undermine public trust in judicial institutions and require coordinated efforts to combat.

title: MrBeast meets Bollywood trio SRK, Salman and Aamir
description: Internet sensation MrBeast, also known as Jimmy Donaldson, has ignited a frenzy with a picture alongside Bollywood titans Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, and Aamir Khan in Saudi Arabia. His cryptic caption, "Hey India, should we all do something together?", has fans buzzing with speculation about a massive upcoming collaboration, potentially uniting global and Indian entertainment.

title: Code Red at Google: ChatGPT beat Google; Sundar Pichai recalls
description: Google CEO Sundar Pichai revealed an internal "code red" following OpenAI's ChatGPT launch, prompting founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin to return. The company dramatically reshaped its AI strategy, launching Bard (now Gemini) and reassigning over 20 AI initiatives to counter the existential threat to its search empire.

description: Over 200 Maoists, including key figures, surrendered in Chhattisgarh's Bastar, marking a significant turning point in the fight against Naxalism. Union Home Minister Amit Shah declared Abujhmarh and North Bastar free from Naxal terror, attributing the success to the government's dual approach of pressure and surrender incentives.

Diwali 2025: Is school holiday on 20th or 21st October?
description: Diwali 2025 school holidays: Diwali 2025 falls on October 20, but school holiday dates vary across states and boards. While most CBSE and ICSE schools have declared a holiday on October 20, some regions may extend the break to October 21 for Govardhan Puja. The confusion arises due to state-specific calendars and local observances. Parents and students are advised to check with their respective schools for the exact schedule, as some institutions may follow different timelines.

The Salat al-Istisqā, a powerful act of faith, takes place around 30 minutes before the regular Friday prayer. Leaders and citizens will unite in supplication, seeking divine mercy and blessings for the nation.

However, Indian sources suggest this reduction hasn't materialized yet, with December/January data expected to show any change. Meanwhile, the Ministry of External Affairs denied any recent conversation between PM Modi and US President Trump regarding this matter, emphasizing India's consumer-centric energy policy.

The incident raises crucial questions about national security and the UK's approach to China.

description: FIDE has approved the "Total Chess World Championship Tour," a new format by Norway Chess, combining Fast Classical, Rapid, and Blitz to find the "Total Chess Player."  The tour, featuring four events annually with a $2.7 million prize pool, aims to innovate chess. A pilot event is set for autumn 2026, with the full season in 2027.

He pledged Congress support for Dalits facing atrocities nationwide. Gandhi stated the family seeks justice and accused the government of obstructing their access to medical care and protection for perpetrators.

Why Trump strike on 'narcoterrorists' in Caribbean could become a legal headache for the US
description: On Thursday, the US military launched another strike against what it described as a suspected drug vessel in the Caribbean. But unlike previous operations — all of which ended with the total destruction of boats and the deaths of everyone on board — this one left survivors, a US official confirmed to Reuters. It’s unclear whether the survivors were rescued, if they’re receiving medical aid, or whether they are now in US custody — possibly as prisoners of war. The Pentagon has not commented.

Delhi: Thar driver runs over teen twice; kills him
description: A 13-year-old boy, Murshid, was tragically killed after being allegedly run over twice by a Mahindra Thar in Vasant Kunj, Delhi. Eyewitnesses reported the SUV driver hit the boy on his bicycle and then reversed over him before fleeing the scene. The victim's family, living in a jhuggi, mourns his loss and seeks justice.

title: 'You don't know who the trainer is': Maharashtra BJP MLA tells Hindu girls to avoid gyms
description: In a provocative statement, BJP's MLA Gopichand Padalkar has stirred debate by recommending that Hindu college women practice yoga in the comfort of their homes. He alleges a 'big conspiracy' aimed at disrupting traditional values, expressing worries about the influence of gym trainers.

title: Karnataka Cabinet approves govt order to regulate use of public properties
‘Never gave anaesthesia’: Cops probe another woman's role in Bengaluru doctor’s murder
description: A surgical resident, Dr. Mahendra Reddy G S, has been arrested and remanded in custody for the alleged murder of his wife, dermatologist Dr. Kritika M Reddy. He is accused of administering an anaesthetic overdose, with forensic reports confirming the presence of Propofol in her viscera. Investigators are examining his motive and how he procured the drug.

Cash, luxury watches & more: How bribe trap led CBI to IPS officer's opulent life
description: A senior IPS officer, Ropar Range DIG Harcharan Singh Bhullar, has been arrested by the CBI. He was apprehended at his Mohali office on bribery charges. An iron merchant had complained of a Rs 8 lakh demand to settle a case. The CBI also seized significant cash, jewellery, luxury watches, and property documents during searches.

title: Gwalior hospital: Worms found in govt-supplied kids’ Azithromycin syrup
description: In a startling turn of events, authorities in Madhya Pradesh have issued a statewide warning following the alarming discovery of worms in a government-provided antibiotic syrup intended for children. Health officials have immediately ceased the distribution of the implicated Azithromycin Oral Suspension and have launched an extensive investigation.

title: 3rd attack in 4 months: Why gangsters are targeting Kapil Sharma's Canada café
description: In a troubling escalation, Kapil Sharma's Kap's Cafe in Canada has been targeted for the third time, this time captured in a shocking video showing a vehicle firing at the venue. Adding to the tension, a post on social media, linked to associates of gangster Lawrence Bishnoi, threatened retaliation against debtors and critics alike.

title: Happy Diwali 2025: Top 60 wishes, messages to light up the celebrations
description: Diwali, the festival of lights, is celebrated with great fervor, symbolizing hope, knowledge, and love. Families gather to share happiness, exchange gifts, and create lasting memories. The article provides 50 wishes, messages, and quotes to help express gratitude and spread joy during this auspicious occasion.

title: MacKenzie Scott cuts Amazon stake by 42%; now holds $12.6bn; prioritises equity work
description: MacKenzie Scott has significantly reduced her Amazon stake, cutting holdings by nearly 42% to $12.6 billion. This reduction occurred despite Amazon's stock performance and follows her extensive philanthropic efforts, which have heavily focused on diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives. The exact reasons for the stake reduction, whether sales or donations, remain unspecified.

title: Diwali 2025: Festival calendar, dates, significance and muhurat guide
description: Diwali, the festival of lights, symbolizes the victory of good over evil and knowledge over ignorance. Celebrated over five days starting October 18, 2025, it honors Lord Rama's return and Goddess Lakshmi's blessings. The main Lakshmi Puja occurs on October 20, with specific auspicious timings for prayers.
